message.body: Hey! Thanks for asking. It's feeling much better, but still depends on the hour/day. How's your armpit?
Cured, i guess i can't wear deodorant, i'm just doomed to be stinky
Do you have school this week?/wanna hang out mon or tues?
Hey dude, I do in fact have lots of school and homework this week, as well as family time Tuesday to Saturday. Not the ideal week for hanging out unfortunately.
